data.text:
Great service and most welcoming staff. Shout out to Shashi and Hussain at the main door who have made my stay really pleasant.
The whole experience was seamless and the front office manager, Mohammed was great. He ensured everything went well.
data.title: Best staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear QueenG85,

Thank you so much for your kind words! Your positive review means a lot to us. We're thrilled to hear that you had a great experience and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Looking forward to serving you again in the future!

Kind Regards,
owner_response.author: Kamilia Mabrouki

data.text:
Great service, very clean & modern hotel. & compliments to the kindest housekeepers Jamal Ahmed & Nijam Uddin! 

Our experience at this hotel is amazing and weâ€™ll definitely be back next time. 

Food is also good, and the pool is stunning and quiet.
data.title: Great!!

data.text: It was amazing stay at Edition - I want to say thank you so much to (Elsayed ) he helps me to send Something to KSA with DHL and always meet me with a big smile and. Hotel so close to Dubai Mall - restaurants was good as well I will come back soon again.
data.title: Amazing hotel I will come back

data.text:
We had a nice vacation at this  hotel Everything was perfect - the room, room service, and the staff. My birthday was on a date during our stay, and I received a lovely slice of cake with a welcome note from the hotel, which was very nice. The information attendant, whose name was Seyed, was extremely helpful and kindly provided us with information about entertainment options in Dubai. 
The room service attendant, Niyas, took great care of our room. The room service was really good.
data.title: Nice vacation at Edition Hotel
